title: Cardano’s Evolution: IOG CEO Hoskinson Unveils Future Plans and Progress
description: In a recent in-depth video update, Charles Hoskinson, the Co-Founder and CEO of IO Global (IOG), shared a comprehensive overview of Cardano’s ongoing development and future roadmap. Cardano, a leading blockchain platform for smart contracts, continues to make significant strides in its evolution, as outlined by Hoskinson. A key focus of Hoskinson’s update was the […]

title: Changpeng Zhao applauds Schiff’s unexpected crypto conversion
description: In a recent lighthearted tweet, CZ, the well-known figure in the cryptocurrency industry, expressed his delight at Peter Schiff’s unexpected conversion. Schiff, who has long been a vocal critic of Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies, surprised many by announcing his involvement in a new project centered around NFT art on the Bitcoin blockchain. The project involves collaborating ... Read more

title: Binance launches compliant platform for users in Japan
description: Binance has announced switching to a new platform explicitly tailored for customers in Japan in a quest to adhere to local regulations
